trans-unit.source: Azure Multi-Factor Authentication Reports
trans-unit.target: Azure Multi-Factor Authentication Reports

trans-unit.source: This describes how to use the Azure Multi-Factor Authentication feature - reports.
trans-unit.target: This describes how to use the Azure Multi-Factor Authentication feature - reports.

trans-unit.source: Reports in Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Reports in Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: Azure Multi-Factor Authentication provides several reports that can be used by you and your organization.
trans-unit.target: Azure Multi-Factor Authentication provides several reports that can be used by you and your organization.

trans-unit.source: These reports can be accessed through the Multi-Factor Authentication Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: These reports can be accessed through the Multi-Factor Authentication Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the available reports.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of the available reports.

trans-unit.source: You can access reports through the Azure Management portal.
trans-unit.target: You can access reports through the Azure Management portal.

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Usage

trans-unit.source: The usage reports display information on overall usage, user summary and user details.
trans-unit.target: The usage reports display information on overall usage, user summary and user details.

trans-unit.source: Server Status
trans-unit.target: Server Status

trans-unit.source: This report displays the status of Multi-Factor Authentication Servers associated with your account.
trans-unit.target: This report displays the status of Multi-Factor Authentication Servers associated with your account.

trans-unit.source: Blocked User History
trans-unit.target: Blocked User History

trans-unit.source: These reports show the history of requests to block or unblock users.
trans-unit.target: These reports show the history of requests to block or unblock users.

trans-unit.source: Bypassed User History
trans-unit.target: Bypassed User History

trans-unit.source: Shows the history of requests to bypass Multi-Factor Authentication for a user's phone number.
trans-unit.target: Shows the history of requests to bypass Multi-Factor Authentication for a user's phone number.

trans-unit.source: Fraud Alert
trans-unit.target: Fraud Alert

trans-unit.source: Shows a history of fraud alerts submitted during the date range you specified.
trans-unit.target: Shows a history of fraud alerts submitted during the date range you specified.

trans-unit.source: Queued
trans-unit.target: Queued

trans-unit.source: Lists reports queued for processing and their status.
trans-unit.target: Lists reports queued for processing and their status.

trans-unit.source: A link to download or view the report is provided when the report is complete.
trans-unit.target: A link to download or view the report is provided when the report is complete.

trans-unit.source: To view reports
trans-unit.target: To view reports

trans-unit.source: Log on to <link><linkText>http://azure.microsoft.com</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Log on to <link><linkText>http://azure.microsoft.com</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: On the left, select Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: On the left, select Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: At the top select Multi-Factor Auth Providers.
trans-unit.target: At the top select Multi-Factor Auth Providers.

trans-unit.source: This will bring up a list of your Multi-Factor Auth Providers.
trans-unit.target: This will bring up a list of your Multi-Factor Auth Providers.

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one Multi-Factor Auth Provider, select the one you wish to view the fraud alert report and click Manage at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: If you have more than one Multi-Factor Auth Provider, select the one you wish to view the fraud alert report and click Manage at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: If you have only one, just click Manage.
trans-unit.target: If you have only one, just click Manage.

trans-unit.source: This will open the Azure Multi-Factor Authentication Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: This will open the Azure Multi-Factor Authentication Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure Multi-Factor Authentication Management Portal, on the left, you will see View a Report.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure Multi-Factor Authentication Management Portal, on the left, you will see View a Report.

trans-unit.source: From here you can select the reports described above.
trans-unit.target: From here you can select the reports described above.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html><linkText>Cloud</linkText><html></html>
